required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Safety Study of FLP Injection to Treat Tumor Patients
clinical_study.official_title: Phase 1 Study of FLP Injection on Tumor Patients

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to determine the tolerance and maximum tolerated dose (MTD) for FLP Injection with multiple dose in tumor patients.

detailed_description.textblock:
To determine the tolerance and MTD for FLP Injection with multiple dose in tumor patients.
To test clinical pharmacokinetics (PK) and PK parameter

primary_outcome.description: to evlauate the symptom of adverse effect and the number of participates with adverse effect

intervention.description: dosage from 93mg/m2 to 331mg/m2, 7 days' continuous dosing, 21 days for one cycle

overall_official.affiliation: First Affiliated Hospital of Zhejiang University
First Affiliated Hospital of Zhejiang University
First Affiliated Hospital of Zhejiang University

facility.name: GCP center,First Affiliated Hospital of Zhejiang University
